abstrac: Writing that makes you money | Pro-Copywriter, Proofreader & Editor
bio:
About you:
You want to create content that connects and increases your revenue.

You're tired of paying outrageous fees to big talkers, and yet getting so little return.

You're also tired of getting offered the lowest fees, only to receive low-quality work.

You just want results.




About me:
I'm glad you're viewing my profile.

I'm Debbie, and I've been working with clients for over five years providing copywriting, editing, proofreading, rewriting, coaching, and content marketing services.

I started my career as an ACCA Certified Accountant with a multinational (where I developed an eagle eye for detail and zero tolerance for errors).

However, my creativity needed expression, and I made a career change into Content Marketing & Communications.

I now use my skills, expertise, and passion to provide writing, editing, strategy, and marketing solutions to help my clients make more money.

I can help you with:

*Ghostwriting
*Copywriting
*Editing & Proofreading
*Social media management (handling posting, commenting, growing your profile)
*Demand generation (using content to drive people to you)
*Email Marketing
*Paid FB, IG ads
*Business plan writing
*Creating and writing landing pages
*Web copy
*Blog writing
*Social media content
* Brand identity strategy and much more


I've provided my services to a number of recipients including:

Palo Alto Networks, WellNest (founded by Swagbucks CEO), FVG, Cadbury, Educational Institutions, startups, numerous authors, public Influencers, and private individuals

I am available for one-off projects as well as long-term work.

Ready when you are!

I love exceeding my clients' expectations and my profile's 5-star feedback from extremely pleased clients testify to this.

I can commit to 40 hours/week for a job, and my working hours are flexible. 

- I prefer Guru Safepay. 
- No upfront required.
- You can pay me after the project has been successfully completed.

bio:
- A fast growing Indian IT company with hghly skilled and energetic software development team. - Experience in analysis and project management, as well as development. - Very flexible skill set.
Pragmatic Solutions Inc is a trusted provider of software solutions and professional services through custom application development and integration of world-class technologies.  We implement complex solutions that satisfy enterprises' needs and empower employees to deliver measurable value to their organizations.

Our outsourcing services enable enterprises to develop software solutions faster, maintain applications at lower costs, re-engineer processes, and modernize systems with no risk.

Our outsourcing solutions have the advantages of highly qualified personnel, systemic procedures, time-tested processes, and invaluable experience to deliver predictable results. This allows our customers to focus on their strategic initiatives and core competencies while leveraging the outsource

We are always flexible in all terms to satisfy our clients.Payment Method:Based on guru.com directives, all the payments are done through guru.com safepay invoicing and/or escrow only. We would require 50% as setup fee for projects that are less than $400 and would require 35% setup fee for projects that are more than $1000. However, for the project value of more than $2500, we would require a setup fee of 10% against the submission of project plan with technical review whereas the balance be paid on completing each milestones as per the project plan or agreement. We accept payment by Check, E-check, Wire Transfer, or SafePay account funds only. Transacting with these Payment Methods is mutually beneficial: We too are saved from the mandatory transaction fees attached to Credit Card and PayPal payments. If the features are added more while the project is on development phase, the cost will be revised based on the time frame or if it may be a 1-3 days of work cost will not be revised

abstrac: If you can IMAGINE it, we can CREATE it! Published nationally and internationally for over 30 years with top-name companies. Our publications are RECENT and in tune with digital marketing!
bio:
A veritable human conglomeration of the very best writers and marketers that money can buy.  Although my name is the Business Name on Guru, we are KLR Marketing Services, LLC and have cut our teeth on getting results for our clients each and every time.

We can motivate your readers for any sale, and motivate them to any action via the perfect words in the perfect combinations. This is combined with high DA backlink packages which will save you money. Our custom work includes a discount of 10 percent on ongoing work. Check out our other services and portfolio!  

High-end Web design, videos, and other "must-have" competitive marketing services also exist.  Call us or email for a free no-obligation quote today and let us inspire and uplift your business! Human Factor Response certified by the US government you will see results! 

Our articles and blogs plus landing pages are riveting and a cut above any competitors you might be seeking to overcome. We study each competitor and ensure that you get the best work possible to beat anyone else out there. 

Clicks are meaningless without conversions! We can take your business into the stratosphere. Everything from articles, email sequences, and proposals. Web design and application are available. 


https://www.emailmarketingideas.com/25-email-marketing-mistakes-to-avoid/
https://www.emailmarketingideas.com/holiday-best-practices/
https://www.emailmarketingideas.com/holiday-campaign-ideas/

Published by top-name companies in the US/UK/CAN under my name. Please ask for more links. The publications are recent and in tune with the needs of both visitors and the latest Google standards. Have clients on Guru and off Guru that purchase only our services. 

More recent published articles exist simply ask for the list. To reiterate, although published first at the age of 15, what worked 20 years ago does not now. We keep up with the latest and greatest SEO and marketing techniques in the frenzied world of digital marketing!

We are flexible and work tirelessly and endlessly.  Call or write for pricing, and time estimates.  We do have expectations of reasonableness, however.  Articles of 1000 words generally start at a $35.00 n hour base rate.  We also can provide Web design and all other marketing materials for eCommerce.

Writing that compels and converts, period coupled with other services that tie everything together flawlessly. We use inspiration and an inside look into the Psychology of Clients. Human Factor Reasoning certifications lead to more sales and allow us to speak to your audience in a way that they will understand and relate to.

WORK TERMS: 

1/2 Deposit Upfront: Other 1/2 Upon Completion
Copyright Remains with KLR Marketing Services, LLC until all payment is received
SafePay Only--Work Does Not Start Until Funded
Zoom/Phone Calls: First Half Hour Free, after that Billed at the Hourly Rate of 25.00 USD per hour.

Take control today.

abstrac: Highly Skilled, US-Based IT Professional Specializing in Excel and Access Development with Database Administration
bio:
I started my IT career as a programmer. I did client/server applications, embedded programming and network/database implementations. I then migrated to the software services area where I created custom enhancements for customers and then installed onsite and trained users.  This got me vital experience with how to treat customers and deliver successful projects.  I have been in the Business Analysis/Development area since doing everything from Project Management, System Requirements and Design, Development, Implementation, Testing, Training and always making sure the customer is happy!

My specialty is Microsoft Office - everything from Excel Formulas to Access database applications to Word Formatting to VBA Programming for any Office product.

I have a very technical background involving computer software, hardware, operating systems, networking, database administration, server administration, email setup and administration, data management and analysis, backup and disaster recovery, remote computer setup, antivirus, web apps and services and more. 

I can handle any challenge, small to large with accuracy, speed and professionalism. I will utilize standard industry project management processes, providing a detailed quote with all requirements broken out by scope,schedule and budget. i will work closely with the customer as well as provide transparency into the progress of the project.

I will not consider the project complete until all requirements are signed off on and the customer is 100% happy.
Projects will be quoted per hour

abstrac: Finance professionals with 15 years of experience in descriptive, predictive and prescriptive analytics
bio:
Dataxis team members are certified finance and analytics professionals with more than 15 years of experience in dash-boarding, financial forecasting, valuations, business plans and report writing.

Dataxis offer services in developing dashboards, automated spreadsheets, databases, graphical user interfaces. The KPI dashboards depicts various metrics  via visually appealing graphs and tables.

Dataxis offer services on all sorts of valuation engagements including IRC 409a (required for issuance of stock options for private companies), valuations of portfolios of companies ranging from privately held companies,early stage to bridge/IPO stage companies, ASC350 (good will impairment testing), ASC805 (Purchase price allocation post acquisition) among others. Dataxis team have also valued these companies using the projected Income statements through DCF, market approach and others.

The financial models involves projecting three financial statements. The revenue forecast are based on industry specific drivers and client’s assumptions. The expenses are decided considering various industry specific cost components and assumptions are made using bench-marks. Models are designed in a way wherein assumptions, revenue drivers changes are translated into outputs and provides scenario and sensitivity analysis.

Key Words:
MS Excel, MS Access, VBA programming, Anaplan, Tableau, NPV models, ROI, IRR, break even analysis, advanced excel formulas, databases, graphical user interface, SPSS, linear optimization, secondary research, top-down forecast, bottom-up forecast, seasonal forecast, attribute analysis, conjoint analysis, and prediction modeling.
Clients pay only after work is delivered and they are satisfied with it.

abstrac: I promise high quality, clean code, timeline.
bio:
Hello! Before talking about qualifications and professional abilities, I would like to introduce myself. Taking web development as a profession not only fulfills my pocket but also my heart because it has been my passion since my early teenage.
Also, I'm an Automation expert and I've built a lot of automation in the businesses by using Integromat or Zapier, and Airtable Automation. I'm really familiar with the No-coding tools like Retool, Stacker, Softr, etc.
I pride myself on being extremely professional and always aim to deliver a job well before a deadline. I am extremely proud of my personable yet professional manner and possess excellent communication skills.

My skills:
- HTML, CSS, SCSS
- Javascript, Node.js, React.js, Next.js
- PHP, Laravel, Codeigniter, CakePHP, WordPress
- PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB
- Airtable, Integromat, Zapier, Monday, ClickUp
- Jira, Git, Bitbucket
- Heroku, AWS
